column1: #Text=Aang says : " That 's not gross , it 's just a part of spring !
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's not that bad , Katara .
#Text=" Aang says : " And a great beard !
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm just glad we finally have another girl in the group , because you two are disgusting .
#Text=" Toph says : " Excuse me , does anyone have a razor ?
